name: We Shall Find Valhalla! - Global Game Jam 2021
name_original: We Shall Find Valhalla! - Global Game Jam 2021
description: Overcome 10 Waves, face enemies with the right weapons. You will lose your weapons all the time, but you will find them again by defeating your enemies. The Shield and the Dash will help you in battles. Find the right strategy and reach the Highest points count.
